alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Terrebonne and central Lafourche Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm producing tropical funnel clouds near Larose, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tropical funnel clouds and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Larose, Cut Off, Lockport, Chauvin, Montegut and Dulac. FUNNEL CLOUDS...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
